example.name: with PP
example.text: Clumps of brush that they passed [*T*-2] were [so many enchained demons]-1 straining in anger [*]-1 to tear [*RNR*-1] and gnaw on [*RNR*-1] [his bones]-1 .

example.name: gnaw at
example.text: Day by day , week by week , month by month , the betrayal gnawed at Andrei 's heart .
